author: Al Jazeera
title: Photos: China's Great Wall as curbs lifted in COVID-19 epicentre
description: Signs of life returning to normal in Hubei with authorities opening a popular section of the iconic Great Wall.
content:
On Tuesday, China announced that a lockdown would be lifted on more than 50 million people in central Hubei province where the coronavirus first emerged late last year.
There are signs that life is returning to normal in the region, with authorities reopenin… [+579 chars]
